title: Chesara Box set
description: Travelling the galaxy in a gilded cage, Chesara has everything she needs, except freedom and the ability to be true to her Dakaran nature.Can a group of opposites, a military watchdog, a fallen Lord, a shipwrecked alien and a space rat defy the mighty Human Federation, survive each other, and their attraction to the most valuable slave in the galaxy?Five full length novels and a unique bonus story.Discovery. Hybrid #1Experiment. Hybrid #2Flight. Hybrid #3Fight. Hybrid #4Silkash. Hybrid #5Hello, Kittycat. Bonus prequel.Reverse Harem with a kick ass heroine, frequently bewildered hot guys, some violence and buckets of angst.
author: Emma Jaye
